justification: Minimal ToM: only notes B “gets two starters,” ignoring B’s stated preference for workhorse RBs and health. Trade contradicts A’s injury-avoidance by acquiring a Questionable WR. Value is wildly lopsided (Tier 1 RB + Tier 1 WR for a Tier 3 WR), and “consolidates assets” is misapplied. Feasible but logically incoherent; B’s acceptance would be near-certain, not 0.65.
